name: HOT STUNT WHEELS - Top 3D Monster Truck Driving
name_original: HOT STUNT WHEELS - Top 3D Monster Truck Driving
description:
Have you ever thought about what it would be like if you were a Hot Stat wheel driver? Well now you can see!

HOT STUNT WHEELS is a fun racing game for everyone!

Get ready to drive through over exciting New levels in this physics based HOT STUNT WHEELS action game.
